subtitleNullable: The FakeAds corpus is annotated at two levels: Tweet level and mention level
descriptionNullable:
This dataset could serve the study of fake news detection on Twitter that targets information that
misleads the consumer by falsely promoting products. The corpus consists of tweets,
annotated at two levels: (1) each tweet is annotated as fake or real, (2) each tweet is
annotated at word level. This is to classify the product into one of the following classes:
cosmetics, health, fashion, or electronics.
title: The FakeAds_Corpus
subtitle: The FakeAds corpus is annotated at two levels: Tweet level and mention level
description:
This dataset could serve the study of fake news detection on Twitter that targets information that
misleads the consumer by falsely promoting products. The corpus consists of tweets,
